message: Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Hi Name,

You recently registered for Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven, but weren’t able to join us. We missed having you with us on presentation day!
Would you mind taking a few moments to tell us why you were unable to attend this webinar?
Your feedback matters as we continue to improve Justia Webinars and plan future events for Justia Connect members. Our team appreciates it more than you know.
Hi Name,
We are excited to announce the release of our latest Justia Webinar recording Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven.

This webinar dives into the world of marketing for solo and small firms by exploring effective and affordable digital and traditional marketing methods, including practical tips and tricks you can implement right away!

Whether you're just starting out or looking to refresh your marketing strategy, you won't want to miss out on these insights. Simply upgrade to Justia Connect Pro for $19.99 to take advantage of this resource.
Hi Name,
We are excited to announce the release of our latest Justia Webinar recording Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven.

This webinar dives into the world of marketing for solo and small firms by exploring effective and affordable digital and traditional marketing methods, including practical tips and tricks you can implement right away!
Whether you're just starting out or looking to refresh your marketing strategy, you won't want to miss out on these insights.
Name,

We wanted to remind you that registration for Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven is now open to all Justia Connect members!

Join David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter, & Wolf, P.A., on Friday, April 21 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT for a free presentation designed to offer solo and small-firm lawyers specific strategies for promoting their brands and reaching more clients.
Save your seat to ensure you can take advantage of actionable insights to promote your law firm’s growth.
Name,

Looking for ways to improve your marketing in a competitive marketing environment? Be sure to register for our upcoming free Justia Webinars presentation, Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven.

You won’t want to miss these practical insights from David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter, & Wolf, P.A. These strategies are specifically designed to help lawyers working with limited time and a limited budget grow their firm.
Hi Name,

You are registered for Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven on Friday, April 21 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT! Don't forget to mark your calendar for the presentation.
On presentation day, you can come back to this email and use this link to join us.
If you have any trouble accessing the presentation, please contact Justia Support for assistance
Hi Name,

This Friday at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT, David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter, & Wolf, P.A. will lead a presentation on helping lawyers build their brand and promote their practice without breaking the bank.
Registration for this presentation is free for all lawyers in the Justia Lawyer Directory. Get on the list today! We’ll see you there.
Hi Name,

Today is the day! Very soon (at 2:00 p.m. ET to be exact), David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter, & Wolf, P.A. will share key insights and strategies for building an impactful brand and promoting a law firm without overspending.
We are confident your practice would benefit from the tips David has to offer. Plus, registration is free! Don’t miss this chance.
Hi Name,
We wanted to send a quick reminder that Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven is beginning soon.
You can click here to join the presentation or access it 15 minutes prior to the scheduled start time via your Justia Connect dashboard.
If you have any trouble joining the webinar, please contact <a href="https://support.justia.com/" target="_blank">Justia Support for assistance.
See you there!
